item.description: This will be a fun night and an opportunity to meet old and new friends.  They have delicious food and a nice atmosphere.  Come join us for a fun evening!  You buy your dinner.  To reserve, call Annette at 860-223-7755.  Directions to 1489 Silas Deane Highway:  I‑91N to exit 24, at end of ramp look straight across the street, Dakota’s is behind the ‘On the Border Mexican Cantina.’
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be inside waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Let's Eat Out
